general_info.summary: This document lists various sections and links related to SUAT 2025, including sample papers, information for global knowledge seekers, recruiter details, banking and postal services, COVID-19 updates, and specific university campuses like Sharda University Uzbekistan and Agra. It also mentions courses on human values and professional ethics, and the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.

undergraduate_programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
eligibility_criteria: High school diploma or equivalent with a minimum GPA of 3.0
Successful completion of mathematics and science courses (specify courses if mentioned)
English proficiency (e.g., TOEFL score of 80 or IELTS score of 6.5, if specified)
required_documents: Standardized test scores (e.g., SAT/ACT, if specified)

undergraduate_programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
eligibility_criteria: High school diploma or equivalent with a minimum GPA of 2.8
Bachelor's degree in any discipline from an accredited institution
Minimum of 2 years of relevant work experience

career_info.summary: This program offers career opportunities in allied health sciences, with graduates typically securing positions with an average annual salary ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences.
